3 import rospy
4 from iauv_motion_planner.srv import GetPath, GetPathRequest
5 from iauv_motion_planner.msg import PlannerParam
6 
7 
8 def call_service():
9  # Initialize the ROS node
10  rospy.init_node("service_caller_node")
11 
12  # Create a service proxy
13  rospy.wait_for_service(
14  "/iauv_motion_planner/getPath"
15  ) # Wait until the service is available
16  try:
17  service_proxy = rospy.ServiceProxy(
18  "/iauv_motion_planner/getPath", GetPath
19  ) # Replace with your actual service type
20 
21  req = GetPathRequest()
22  req.header.frame_id = "world_ned"
23 
24  # req.planner = GetPathRequest.SIMPLE
25 
26  # req.planner = GetPathRequest.CIRCULAR
27  # param = PlannerParam()
28  # param.key = "radius"
29  # param.value = "4"
30  # req.params.append(param)
31 
32  req.planner = GetPathRequest.SCANNER
33  # param = PlannerParam()
34  # param.key = "segment_length"
35  # param.value = "0.3"
36  # req.params.append(param)
37  param = PlannerParam()
38  param.key = "width"
39  param.value = "7"
40  req.params.append(param)
41  param = PlannerParam()
42  param.key = "length"
43  param.value = "5"
44  req.params.append(param)
45 
46  req.start.position.x = -5
47  req.start.position.y = -5
48  req.start.position.z = 5
49  req.start.orientation.w = 1
50  # goal or center of request
51  req.goal.position.x = 0
52  req.goal.position.y = 0
53  req.goal.position.z = 3
54  # req.goal.orientation.w = 0.707
55  # req.goal.orientation.z = 0.707
56  # req.goal.orientation.w = 0.924
57  # req.goal.orientation.z = 0.383
58  req.goal.orientation.w = 1
59  req.goal.orientation.z = 0
60 
61  # Call the service
62  response = service_proxy(req)
63  rospy.loginfo(f"Service response: {response}") # Log the response
64 
65  except rospy.ServiceException as e:
66  rospy.logerr(f"Service call failed: {e}")
67 
68 
69 if __name__ == "__main__":
70  call_service()
